rows.label: bf11110100_0010
rows.name: I see... so that's how you and Shin met.

rows.label: bf11110100_0015
rows.name: Sounds like you've had it rough...

rows.label: bf11110100_0018
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]adlib weeping at sadness of tale

rows.label: bf11110100_0020
rows.name: There he goes again...

rows.label: bf11110100_0040
rows.name: Eat up while it's hot.

rows.label: bf11110100_0090
rows.name:
By the way, why are you registered
with a mercenary group?

rows.label: bf11110100_0100
rows.name: I don't like being tied down.

rows.label: bf11110100_0110
rows.name:
This way, I'm not tied down by anyone. I can help
the people and the causes that I choose to believe in.

rows.label: bf11110100_0120
rows.name:
Everyone everywhere is just struggling to get by,
aren't they? I can't stand that.

rows.label: bf11110100_0130
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: bf11110100_0140
rows.name:
It'd be great if the world worked that way,
but I don't think things are quite that simple.

rows.label: bf11110100_0150
rows.name: It's a matter of perspective.

rows.label: bf11110100_0160
rows.name:
Mercenaries have their role, and statesmen have theirs.
Each has their own way of acting.

rows.label: bf11110100_0170
rows.name: No role is without purpose.

rows.label: bf11110100_0180
rows.name:
My, taking the humans' side.
You're a rare sort of Blade.

rows.label: bf11110100_0190
rows.name: I'd say a Blade like you is the rarer one.

rows.label: bf11110100_0200
rows.name: Well, obviously. Since I'm[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf11110100_0210
rows.name: Lacking in compassion.

rows.label: bf11110100_0220
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?!

rows.label: bf11110100_0230
rows.name: It's not every day you meet a Blade like you.

rows.label: bf11110100_0240
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Ngh!

rows.label: bf11110100_0250
rows.name: So, about Shin... I suppose it's no use, is it?

rows.label: bf11110100_0260
rows.name: You're asking me to slay you?

rows.label: bf11110100_0270
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: bf11110100_0280
rows.name:
The mission I received from my country
is the Heaven's Holy Grailâ€”

rows.label: bf11110100_0290
rows.name:
My mission is to defeat Metsu.
Not to get some treasure back.

rows.label: bf11110100_0300
rows.name: I don't give a damn about any treasure, anyway.

rows.label: bf11110100_0310
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf11110100_0320
rows.name:
What do you say?
Would you consider lending us your strength?

rows.label: bf11110100_0330
rows.name:
You two are incredibly strong. And there's a lot
I'd like to learn, like that fighting style.

rows.label: bf11110100_0340
rows.name: Let's see...

rows.label: bf11110100_0350
rows.name:
How about this: on my journey, I found this hidden
treasure by chance, and I entrusted it to you,

rows.label: bf11110100_0360
rows.name:
since you were a suitable Driver.
In order to defeat Metsu.

rows.label: bf11110100_0370
rows.name: What do you think of a story like that?

rows.label: bf11110100_0380
rows.name: So you mean...
